results.content: This course is one of the most thoroughly explained resources on Spring. The author has taken his time to explain the "magic" that happens behind the scenes, so you get to understand what happens under the hood in a Spring application. Can't recommend this course enough.
results.content_html: This course is one of the most thoroughly explained resources on Spring. The author has taken his time to explain the "magic" that happens behind the scenes, so you get to understand what happens under the hood in a Spring application. Can't recommend this course enough.

results.content: Clear and perfect to start Spring framework journey,
results.content_html: Clear and perfect to start Spring framework journey,

results.content: Vinod is really great trainer!! He explains the all concepts in such a easy language that a normal person without much technical skills can also understand it fully.

response.content: Thank you so much Nisha. Really appreciate

results.content: Great course to brush up fundamentals during interviews. Quick, crisp explanation with no fillers.
results.content_html: Great course to brush up fundamentals during interviews. Quick, crisp explanation with no fillers.

results.content:
It's a fast moving course, so this is good for experienced developers who can quickly pick things up. However there are times when you still want things explained in depth and this seems to be missing, still most concepts are explained well.

One negative for me is he fails to clean up code and continues. This leads to some confusion.
